Media

  • Recognitions

Recognitions

WORLD YOUTH SKILL DAY, 2022

On the occasion of World Youth Skill Day, Yashaswi Group has recognized & applauded entrepreneurs who have established their own ventures.

The Entrepreneurs where applauded by Kavita Jawale, Assistant Commissioner Kaushlya Vikas Rojgar & Ajay Kautikvar from De-Asara Foundation.

CERTIFICATE OF APPRECIATION, 2021

BOSCH Chassis Systems India Pvt Ltd. has appreciated Yashaswi Group In recognition of Meeting the Bosch HSE Criteria in 2021.

This is a sign of trust, confidence and belief our patron has in Yashaswi Group.

BEST PERFORMING NAPS TPA, 2021

BOSCH Chassis Systems India Pvt Ltd. has appreciated Yashaswi Group In recognition of Meeting the Bosch HSE Criteria in 2021.

This is a sign of trust, confidence and belief our patron has in Yashaswi Group.

BEST PERFORMING NAPS TPA, 2021

Automotive Skill Development Council (ASDC) has awarded Yashaswi Group as The Best Performing Third Party Aggregator (TPA) for Apprenticeship program for the tenure 2020-2021.

KAUSHALACHARYA AWARD, 2020

Focus on accelerating skilling of youth across the nation, the Ministry appointed Yashaswi Group as a Third Party Aggregator for its Apprenticeship Program.

Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship has awarded “Kaushalacharya Award” to Yashaswi Group for engaging the highest Apprentices for 2020.

LIFETIME ACHIEVEMENT AWARD, 2019

Suryadatta Education Foundation has awarded “Lifetime Achievement Award” to Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni for excellence in the field of Vocational Education & Skill Development.

Recognitions

WORLD YOUTH SKILL DAY, 2022

On the occasion of World Youth Skill Day, Yashaswi Group has recognized & applauded entrepreneurs who have established their own ventures.

The Entrepreneurs where applauded by Kavita Jawale, Assistant Commissioner Kaushlya Vikas Rojgar & Ajay Kautikvar from De-Asara Foundation.

CERTIFICATE OF APPRECIATION, 2021

BOSCH Chassis Systems India Pvt Ltd. has appreciated Yashaswi Group In recognition of Meeting the Bosch HSE Criteria in 2021.

This is a sign of trust, confidence and belief our patron has in Yashaswi Group.

BEST PERFORMING NAPS TPA, 2021

BOSCH Chassis Systems India Pvt Ltd. has appreciated Yashaswi Group In recognition of Meeting the Bosch HSE Criteria in 2021.

This is a sign of trust, confidence and belief our patron has in Yashaswi Group.

BEST PERFORMING NAPS TPA, 2021

Automotive Skill Development Council (ASDC) has awarded Yashaswi Group as The Best Performing Third Party Aggregator (TPA) for Apprenticeship program for the tenure 2020-2021.

KAUSHALACHARYA AWARD, 2020

Focus on accelerating skilling of youth across the nation, the Ministry appointed Yashaswi Group as a Third Party Aggregator for its Apprenticeship Program.

Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship has awarded “Kaushalacharya Award” to Yashaswi Group for engaging the highest Apprentices for 2020.

LIFETIME ACHIEVEMENT AWARD, 2019

Suryadatta Education Foundation has awarded “Lifetime Achievement Award” to Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni for excellence in the field of Vocational Education & Skill Development.

Shaikshanik Bhushan Award 2010 for YIT

With the approval of Learn & Earn scheme by the Government of Maharashtra, the Annasaheb Magar Foundation recognised and celebrated YIT’s contribution to education at the State Level. The Shaikshanik Bhushan Award for the year 2010, was bestowed upon the institute.

Indian Leadership Award for Excellence in Education 2013

For his immense contribution to the field of education and skill development, Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni was awarded the prestigious Indian Leadership Award for Excellence in Education for the year 2013. The award was conferred upon him by Shri Bhishma Narayan Singh, former Governor & Cabinet Minister in a glittering ceremony organised by All India Achievers Foundation at India Habitat Centre, New Delhi.

Recognising YIT’s contribution to Make in Maharahstra at Yashotsav Pimpri 2015

Yashotsav, a convocation of sorts that celebrated the completion of training of students at YIT. The event saw the students getting their certificates at the hands of Shri. Amar Sable, Member of Parliament. Shri. Sable also pointed out Yashaswi Group’s extensive participation in skill development across Maharashtra, which he said had played a crucial role in strengthening industries in Maharashtra.

Celebrating the legacy of YIT at Yashtosav Pune 2015

The Learn & Earn Scheme of YIT earned special words of appreciation from Shri. Gautam Chabukswar, Member of Legislative Assembly, Maharashtra at the felicitation ceremony of the latest batch of pass-outs of the YIT Learn & earn Scheme. The best performing students were given gold medals and certificates in the presence of dignitaries.

Unveiling Yashogatha at Yashtosav Aurangabad 2015

When the nation is focused on skill development, the work done by Yashaswi Group continues to inspire everyone. These were the words of Shri. Sameer Kulkarni, Managing Director, Bajaj Auto, at the unveiling of Yashogatha, a memoir of the legacy of YIT at Yashotsav Aurangabad.

News & Events

ECONOMICS TIMES AWARD, 2022

Yashaswi group is a leading organization active in the domain of Human Resources across sectors. These awards are a testament to our conviction & dedication towards achieving our vision of empowering the nation through upskilling. We extend our gratitude to the jury for recognizing our efforts toward skilling and vocational education and reinforcing our commitment to making a positive impact on the youth.

Abhishek Kulkarni, Managing Director of Yashaswi has been awarded the “Economic Times Inspiring CEO” in the field of Skill Development & Vocational Education.

News & Events

BEST TRAINING PARTNER- NAPS, 2021

Yashaswi Group is associated with more than 900+ patrons nationwide and has trained more than 3,00,000 trainees through various programs.

Rubber, Chemical & Petrochemical Skill Development Council (RCPSDC) has awarded Yashaswi Group has “Best Training Partner- NAPS”.

COLLABORATION WITH KOTAK EDUCATION FOUNDATION, 2022

Kotak Education Foundation collaborated with Yashaswi Group for launching Banking & Financial Services and Insurance (BFSI) & Customer Relation Support (CRS) training courses for aspirants.

The inaugural ceremony was graced by Mr. Vishwesh Kulkarni, Chairman Yashaswi Group, Mr. Ganesh Raja, CEO Kotak Education Foundation, along with Ms. Namrata Ashok, Ms. Smita Dhumal, Mr. Kannan KCS & Mr. Rajesh Nagare.

LEARN & EARN – A ROLE MODEL IN EDUCATION SYSTEM, 2021

With the world on a tidal wave of technological advancement, keeping pace with, it has become a basic necessity for our youth. Formal Education system has limitations, that pose a major challenge. Inspired by the Dual Education Model of Germany, Yashaswi has developed a Dynamic Vocational Education model to imbibe practical skills and theoretical knowledge to align our youth with the ever changing global scenario.

Mr. Vishwesh Kulkarni, Chairman Yashaswi Group talking about Learn & Earn Program to be implemented with a new transformation.

June 18, 2015
THIRD PARTY AGGREGATOR FOR APPRENTICESHIP PROGRAM
Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship, Government of India has been in full drive since the announcement of Skill India and Make in India programs. With the focus on accelerating the skilling of youth across the country, the Ministry appointed Yashaswi Group as a Third Party Aggregator for its Apprenticeship Program. Yashaswi is one of the very few such Third Party Aggregators, appointed by the Government of India.
The MOU was signed between Yashaswi and the Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship in the presence of Shri. Rajesh Agarwal (Joint Secretary MSDE), Shri. Rajeev Pratap Rudy (Honourable Minister of MSDE), Shri. Rohit Nandan (Principal Secretary MSDE) and Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni (President, Yashaswi Group).
February 3, 2016
MOU WITH DELHI GOVERNMENT FOR SKILL DEVELOPMENT AND APPRENTICESHIP
Working on the mandate given by the Government of India to extensively take up skill development and training, the Delhi Government signed an MOU with Yashaswi Group for the implementation of Skill Development and Apprenticeship Program, through their Training & Education Directorate.
The MOU was signed between Yashaswi and the Delhi Government in the presence of Shri. Jayant Krishna (COO – NSDC), Shri. Manish Sisodia (Deptuy CM, Delhi Government), Shri. Puniya Shrivastav (Principal Secretary – Higher & Technical Education, Delhi Government), Shri. Anil Khaitan (Vice President, Chamber of Commerce) and Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni (President, Yashaswi Group).
April 18, 2015
RECOGNITION OF YASHASWI’S EFFORTS BY ASSOCHEM
ASSOCHEM, an organisation of national repute, felicitated Yashaswi Institute of Technology with the ‘National Education Excellence Assochem Award’ for ‘India’s best technical and skill development program’. The award was conferred upon Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni at an elaborate function in New Delhi at the hands of Dr. Ram Shankar Katheria, Minister for Higher Education (Govt. of India).
The recognition for Yashaswi was a result of its extensive work in the field of skill development, nationally. From developing the first Maharashtra Skill Development Centre to running an extremely successful Learn & Earn Scheme for more than 16,000 students across 185 companies, Yashaswi has led the way in skill development through education for many years.
July 6, 2013
INDIAN LEADERSHIP AWARD FOR EXCELLENCE IN EDUCATION 2013
For his immense contribution to the field of education and skill development, Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni was awarded the prestigious Indian Leadership Award for Excellence in Education for the year 2013. The award was conferred upon him by Shri Bhishma Narayan Singh, former Governor & Cabinet Minister in a glittering ceremony organised by All India Achievers Foundation at India Habitat Centre, New Delhi.
The event was also graced by Major Ved Prakash, Secretary General, All India Congress Committee, Shri. CVC Krishnamurthy, Former CEC, Shri. Joginder Singh, Former CBI Director & Shri. O P Verma, Former Chief Justice & Governor. The recognition adds more energy to the mission of empowering students through skill development, which has been pursued passionately by Yashaswi Group, over more than 3 decades.
May 10, 2010
SHAIKSHANIK BHUSHAN AWARD 2010 FOR YIT
With the approval of Learn & Earn scheme by the Government of Maharashtra, the Annasaheb Magar Foundation recognised and celebrated YIT’s contribution to education at the State Level. The Shaikshanik Bhushan Award for the year 2010, was bestowed upon the institute.
Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni, President, Yashaswi Group received the award at an elaborate ceremony. The different initiatives of Yashaswi Group, have over the years, helped in empowering thousands of underprivileged students from across India with technical skills to shape a career in different industries, and pursue success.
March 23, 2015
RASHTRIYA EKTA PURASKAR FOR EXTENSIVE SKILL DEVELOPMENT
Skilling and imparting knowledge are great levelers. They bring people from different strata and regions on the same page, as they strive to overcome challenges and achieve success. All India National Unity Council recognised the contribution of Yashaswi Group in skill development and felicitated its efforts with the National Unity Award (Rashtriya Ekta Puraskar).
A grand ceremony in New Delhi, saw the award being conferred upon Shri. Vishwesh Kulkarni at the hands of Dr. Bhishma Narayan Singh, Honourable Minister, Government of India. Dr. Singh spoke highly of how Yashaswi has persevered and made skill development a reality for the underprivileged youth and created success stories, which the nation can get inspired by.
July 15, 2015
INAUGURATION OF ANNASAHEB ATRE SKILL DEVELOPMENT CENTRE
Taking further the extensive association of Yashaswi Group with skill development and training of youth, a skill development centre was launched by the Rasta Peth Education Society, in collaboration with the Yashaswi Group. Honourable MP from Pune, Shri Anil Shirole inaugurated the centre, on the occasion of World Skill Day. The centre will offer courses in beauty therapy & hair dressing, tailoring, wireman & electrician, mobile repairing, security guard training and information technology.
The honourable guest said at the launch that Yashaswi’s expertise has created a tremendous impact already and should now focus on fast-tracking the Make in India mission through enhanced skill development.
March 20, 2017
EMPOWERING THE DIFFERENTLY ABLED CHILDREN WITH ‘JHEP’
While empowering underprivileged youth through training and skill development has been a conscious and consistent focus at Yashaswi, the evolving times have thrown up challenging scenarios. One such scenario is the value addition to the lives of differently abled children. Jhep, an organisation based in Pune camp has worked extensively in empowering such children. In a collaborative effort, Jhep invited Yashaswi Group to interact and engage with the parents of such differently abled children.
Mr. Yogesh Rangnekar, on the behalf of Yashaswi Group, spoke to the parents and emphasised on the importance of skill development in the life these special children. Many parents showed willingness to take up such skill development programs for their children with Yashaswi, in collaboration with Pune Cantonment Board and Jhep.
